Oslo.name: Sentrum
Oslo.description: City center with Royal Palace, Karl Johans gate, and Oslo Cathedral

Oslo.name: Grünerløkka
Oslo.description: Trendy district with vintage shops, cafes, street art, and river walks

Oslo.name: Aker Brygge
Oslo.description: Waterfront development with restaurants, bars, and fjord views

Oslo.name: Frogner
Oslo.description: Upscale residential area with Vigeland Sculpture Park and embassies

Oslo.name: Majorstuen
Oslo.description: Shopping and residential district with boutiques and cafes

Bergen.name: Bryggen
Bergen.description: UNESCO Hanseatic wharf with colorful wooden warehouses and fish market

Bergen.name: Fisketorget
Bergen.description: Fish market area with fresh seafood, restaurants, and harbor views
